text: During the seven days of the feast that begins on the fifteenth day of the seventh month,45:25 That is, Sukkot, the autumn feast of pilgrimage to Jerusalem; also translated as the Feast of Booths or the Feast of Shelters and originally called the Feast of Ingathering (see Exodus 23:16 and Exodus 34:22). he is to make the same provision for sin offerings, burnt offerings, grain offerings, and oil.â€™
